techmeme.title: The iPhone 17 Pro starts at $1,099 and the Pro Max at $1,199, both with 256GB of storage, and for the first time, the Pro Max offers up to 2TB (Dominic Preston/The Verge)
Apple announces a new line of accessories, including a slim MagSafe battery, a bumper case for the iPhone Air, new TechWoven cases, and a crossbody strap (Jay Peters/The Verge)
Apple unveils iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max, with an aluminum unibody design, vapor chamber thermal management, Ceramic Shield 2 glass, and three 48MP rear cameras (Zac Hall/9to5Mac)
Apple announces the ultra-slim, eSIM-only iPhone Air with a 5.6mm design, A19 Pro chip, N1 wireless chip for Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, Center Stage front camera, more (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Apple announces the iPhone 17, featuring the A19 chip, larger 6.3" display and 120Hz ProMotion support, improved brightness of up to 3,000 nits, and more (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
